      • getHearderBit

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getHearderBit(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> frequencyBit,
                                                           long simHash)
        build lish bit header for query in mysql, we choose h bit = 8, ** note: Because index in array from left to right but bit right to left, when we use Bitwise operation please remember this. example 1 ship left 8 bit <=> (1 << (64 - 8))
        Parameters:
        frequencyBit -
        simHash -
        Returns:
